name: Dr. Maryam Zolnoori
bio: Maryam Zolnoori, PhD, is an Assistant Professor of Health Sciences Research in the School of Nursing. She received her PhD in health sciences-clinical Informatics from the University of Wisconsin-Milwaukee.

bio: Ali is a researcher in artificial intelligence specializing in natural language processing, speech analysis, and AI applications in cognitive science.

name: Sina Rashidi
bio: Sina is a research scientist with a passion for applying natural language processing to healthcare applications and clinical text analysis.
